title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - May 18, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - May 18, 2021
description:
Mark and Adam review the recently released body cam footage in the shooting of Andrew Brown Jr., they also discuss a landmark Supreme Court ruling on the 4th amendment and briefly touch on why Bill Gates may have been associating with Jeffrey Epstein

Watch the episode on YouTube & subscribe exclusively at our channel YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast
